    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The motor effect</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Bewegungseffekt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'effet de moteur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O efeito do motor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'effetto del motore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επίδραση μηχανών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El efecto del motor</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The figure illustrates the magnetic field lines around a current carrying conducting wire that is placed between two magnets.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conducting wire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Current flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field lines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field strength</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic fields</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">motor effect</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildung veranschaulicht das magnetische 
auffangen Zeilen um eine Stromtragende Leitleitung, die 
zwischen zwei Magneten plaziert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La figure illustre les lignes de champ 
magnétique autour d'un fil de conduite portant de courant qui est 
placé entre deux aimants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A figura ilustra as linhas do campo magnético em
torno de um fio conduzindo carregando da corrente que seja colocado 
entre dois ímãs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La figura illustra le righe del campo magnetico 
intorno ad un legare di condotta trasportante della corrente che è 
disposto fra due magneti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αριθμός επεξηγεί τις γραμμές μαγνητικών πεδίων 
γύρω από ένα ρεύμα που φέρνει διευθύνοντας το καλώδιο που 
τοποθετείται μεταξύ δύο μαγνητών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La figura ilustra las líneas del campo 
magnético alrededor de un alambre que conduce que lleva de la 
corriente que se coloque entre dos imanes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
